text: Steven John Reid (born 10 March 1981) is a former professional footballer who played as a right back, having previously played most of his career in midfield. He is currently a first team coach at Nottingham Forest. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League FA Cup League Cup Europe Other Total
